articles.title: Bharti Airtel Q4 results: Net profit zooms 164% to ₹2,008 crore
articles.description: Revenue from operations rose 22% to  ₹31,500 crore in the January-March period, compared with  ₹25,747 crore in the corresponding period of last year.
articles.content: Telecom major Bharti Airtel's net profit more than doubled, rising 164% to 2,008 crore in the three months ended March. The same was 759 crore in the last year period.
